Sentencas: Reducing the operational temperature of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is vital to improving their durability and lifetime.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: However, a traditional SOFC suffers from high ohmic and polarization losses at low temperatures, leading to poor performance.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: Gadolinium-doped ceria is the best ionic conductor for SOFC at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: The present work envisages the GDC as an electrolyte for applying low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LTSOFCs).
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: So, in this regard, herein, GDC is synthesized through a wet chemical co precipitation technique as a functional electrolyte layer fixed between two symmetrical porous electrodes NCAL (Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2).
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: Due to the improved surface properties of the synthesized GDC, particles perform better than commercially available GDC.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: The synthesized GDC electrolyte shows an impressive fuel cell performance of 569 mW/cm2 and a high ionic conductivity of 0.1 S/cm at a shallow temperature of 450 degrees C. Moreover, the fuel cell device utilizing the synthesized GDC remained stable for 150 h of operation at a high current density of 110 mA/cm2 at 450 degrees C.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: The high conduction mechanism has been proposed in detail.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: The results show that excellent fuel cell performance, high ionic con-ductivity, and better stability can be achieved at exceptionally low enough temperatures.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: Also, the proposed work suggests that new electrolytes can be designed for developing advanced low-temperature fuel cell technology.
Titulo: Designing Gadolinium-doped ceria electrolyte for low temperature electrochemical energy conversion
